body:
Just assign ROLE_ADMIN to user.role, then the select will show it as initial value

<select class="form-control margin-bottom" [(ngModel)]="user.role">
   <option value="ROLE_ADMIN">admin</option>
   <option value="ROLE_USER">user</option>
</select>

or assign it to selected and on change assign it to user.role yourself.

<select class="form-control margin-bottom" [(ngModel)]="selected" (ngModelChange)="user.role = $event">
   <option value="ROLE_ADMIN">admin</option>
   <option value="ROLE_USER">user</option>
</select>
title: Select binded value on combobox with Angular 2
